item.description:
As you know, I try to offer as many opportunities to learn NLP and/or hypnosis, so I am letting you know about an upcoming meetup.  This is actually a meetup of the Central Mass Hypnosis and NLP group run by Chris Adshade.

Chris is one of the most competent hypnotists I know so you won't be disappointed.

"At our last meeting one of the suggested topics was dealing with difficult people as well as coping with negativity.  Many times these two things go hand and hand....but not necesarily.  You could have a difficult person to deal with that is not negative.  So this meetup meeting will be dealing primarily with "difficult people" and how hypnosis and nlp can help in this situation. 

We will have a more formalized meeting compared to our last month's meeting that was a casual meet and greet.  We will discuss how people are "difficult" in the work and home enviroment and some strategies on dealing with those people.  We will have a hypnosis/nlp session related to the topic that will change peoples perspecitves and give them a new outlook on dealing with difficult people they encounter. 

This is a topic that relates to everyone in our everyday lives.......come learn, change and find new techniques for this everyday problem.  Dont be shy.....Come on by!!!"

See you there!"

I will not be able to make it but be assured that Chris will offer some great NLP techniques and strategies.  hmmm... Maybe some language skills.

Email him if you have any questions.

 

Kevin
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign or ask about the hypnosis meetup

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Meetup - Dealing with Difficult People - Marlborough
